verses.verse: These are the inheritances which the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> took<WH5157> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> which Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' houses of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> distributed to them,<WH5157>
by the lot<WH1486> of their inheritance,<WH5159> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> by<WH3027> Moses,<WH4872> for the nine<WH8672> tribes,<WH4294> and for the<WH2677> half-tribe.<WH4294>

For Moses<WH4872> had given<WH5414> the inheritance<WH5159> of the two<WH8147> tribes<WH4294> and the<WH2677> half-tribe<WH4294> beyond<WH5676> the Jordan;<WH3383> but to the Levites<WH3881> he gave<WH5414> no inheritance<WH5159> among them.<WH8432>

For the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> were two<WH8147> tribes,<WH4294> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim:<WH669> and they gave<WH5414> no portion<WH2506> to the Levites<WH3881> in the land,<WH776> except cities<WH5892> to dwell<WH3427> in,<WH4054> with their suburbs for their livestock<WH4735> and for their property.<WH7075>
The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> and they divided<WH2505> the land.<WH776>

Then the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> drew<WH5066> near to Joshua<WH3091> in Gilgal.<WH1537> Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenizzite<WH7074> said<WH559> to him,<WH3045> "You know the thing<WH1697> that Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> concerning me<WH182> and concerning you<WH182> in Kadesh Barnea.<WH6947>

I was forty<WH705> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH7971> me from Kadesh Barnea<WH6947> to spy out<WH7270> the land.<WH776> I brought<WH7725> him word<WH1697> again<WH7725> as it was in my heart.<WH3824>
Nevertheless,<WH251> my brothers who went up<WH5927> with me made the heart<WH3820> of the people<WH5971> melt;<WH4529> but I wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> Yahweh<WH3068> my God.<WH430>

Moses<WH4872> swore<WH7650> on that day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559> <WH776> 'Surely the land where you<WH7272> walked<WH1869> shall be an inheritance<WH5159> to you and to your children<WH1121><WH99999> forever,<WH5769> because you have wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> Yahweh<WH3068> my God.<WH430>'

"Now,<WH3068> behold, Yahweh has kept me alive,<WH2421> as he spoke,<WH1696> these forty-five<WH705> <WH2568> years,<WH8141> from the time<WH227> that Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> this word<WH1697> to Moses,<WH4872> while Israel<WH3478> walked<WH1980> in the wilderness.<WH4057> Now,<WH8084> behold, I am eighty-five <WH2568> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> today.<WH3117>

As yet I am as strong<WH2389> today<WH3117> as I was in the day<WH3117> that Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> me:<WH3581> as my strength was then,<WH3581> even so is my strength now for war,<WH4421> to go out<WH3318> and to come in.<WH935>

Now therefore give<WH5414> me this hill<WH2022> country,<WH3068> of which Yahweh spoke<WH1696> in that day;<WH3117> for you heard<WH8085> in that day<WH3117> how the Anakim<WH6062> were there,<WH1419> and great and fortified<WH1219> cities.<WH5892> It may be<WH194> that Yahweh<WH3068> will be with<WH854> me,<WH3423> and I shall drive them out, as Yahweh<WH3068> spoke.<WH1696>"
Joshua<WH3091> blessed<WH1288> him;<WH5414> and he gave Hebron<WH2275> to Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> for an inheritance.<WH5159>

Therefore Hebron<WH2275> became the inheritance<WH5159> of Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenizzite<WH7074> to this day;<WH3117> because he wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>
Now the name<WH8034> of Hebron<WH2275> before<WH6440> was Kiriath Arba,<WH7153> after the greatest<WH1419> man<WH120> among the Anakim.<WH6062> The land<WH776> had rest<WH8252> from war.<WH4421>
